version_description:
1. Half the ad, Double the delight!
- We cut in half of the number of popup ads!
- Now, pop up ads only play when you clear *stages and every 4 orders completed.

2. New stages!
- The world extended to stage 25!
- 5 new cakes added!

Update new :D

2. UI/UX improvements

** Holiday Season Period Change: Starts one day early.

1) x2 revenue boost ad duration increased to 1 hour => 4 hours.

2) Part time duration increased to 5 minutes => 30 minutes.
